Package project2

Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
project2.Scheduler
public class Scheduler extends Object
The Scheduler class manages appointment scheduling, through a command-line interface. It allows user to manipulate appointments and print them by various criteria until terminated by Q command.
Author:
Shahnaz Khan, Vy Nguyen

      private boolean isValidCommand(String command)
      Helper method: Check if the command is valid
      Parameters:
      command - the command to check
      Returns:
      true if the command is valid, false otherwise

    • processCommand

      private boolean processCommand(String command, String[] parts)
      Helper method: Process each command
      Parameters:
      command - the command to process
      parts - the parts of the command
      Returns:
      true if the command is processed successfully, false otherwise.

    • isValidApptData

      private boolean isValidApptData(String apptDateStr, String timeslotStr, String fName, String lName, String dob, String providerName)
      Helper method: Check if appointment data is valid
      Parameters:
      apptDateStr - the date of appointment
      timeslotStr - the timeslot of appointment
      fName - the first name of patient
      lName - the last name of patient
      dob - the date of birth of patient
      providerName - the providers name for this appointment
      Returns:
      true if the appointment data is valid, false otherwise.

    • findProvider

      private Provider findProvider(String providerName)
      Helper method: Finds a provider by name
      Parameters:
      providerName - the name of provider
      Returns:
      the provider if found, null otherwise.

    • isValidProvider

      private boolean isValidProvider(String providerName)
      Helper method: Check if a provider is valid
      Parameters:
      providerName - the name of the provider
      Returns:
      true if the provider is valid, false otherwise.

    • isValidDOB

      private boolean isValidDOB(String dobStr)
      Helper method: Check if a date of birth is valid
      Parameters:
      dobStr - the date of birth
      Returns:
      true if the date of birth is valid, false otherwise.

    • getTimeslot

      private Timeslot getTimeslot(String timeslotStr)
      Retrieves a Timeslot object based on the provided timeslot string.
      Parameters:
      timeslotStr - the string representation of the timeslot index.
      Returns:
      the corresponding Timeslot object, or null if the timeslot is invalid.

    • isValidApptDate

      private boolean isValidApptDate(String appointmentDateStr)
      Helper method: Check if the appointment date is valid. This method checks if the provided appointment date string represents is not today or a date before today, it not a weekend, and is within six months.
      Parameters:
      appointmentDateStr - the string representation of the appointment
      Returns:
      true if the appointment date is valid, false otherwise.

    • hasConflict

      private boolean hasConflict(Profile patient, Date apptDate, Timeslot timeslot, Provider provider)
      Check if there is conflict with the given appointment details. This method checks for two types of conflicts: - If the same patient already has an appointment at the same time slot. - If any other patient has an appointment with the same provider at the same time slot.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient's profile
      apptDate - the appointment date
      timeslot - the appointment time slot
      provider - the appointment provider
      Returns:
      true if there is a conflict, false otherwise.

    • createTempAppt

      private Appointment createTempAppt(String[] tokens, boolean includeProvider, Integer timeslotIndex)
      Helper method: create temprary appointment from provided tokens. This method extract the appointment details from the tokens and create appointment object.
      Parameters:
      tokens - the array of tokens containing the appointment details
      includeProvider - whether to include a provider in the appointment
      timeslotIndex - the index of the timeslot
      Returns:
      the temporary appointment object, or null if the timeslot if invalid.

    • scheduleAppointment

      private boolean scheduleAppointment(String[] tokens)
      Schedules an appointment based on the provided tokens.
      Parameters:
      tokens - the array of tokens containing the appointment details
      Returns:
      true if the appointment is scheduled successfully, false otherwise.

    • recheduleAppointment

      private boolean recheduleAppointment(String[] tokens)
      Reschedules an appointment based on the provided tokens.
      Parameters:
      tokens - the array of tokens containing the appointment details.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment is rescheduled successfully, false otherwise.

    • cancelAppointment

      private boolean cancelAppointment(String[] tokens)
      Cancels an appointment based on the provided tokens.
      Parameters:
      tokens - the array of tokens containing the appointment details
      Returns:
      true if the appointment is canceled successfully, false otherwise.

    • printBillingStatements

      private void printBillingStatements()
      Prints the billing statement for all appoinments.

      public void run()
